Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery. The two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions, he continued. n't heard: Did Eric Schmidt jump ship, or was he forced to walk the plank? He Jumped Eric Schmidt has ''career aspirations outside of Google,'' says Bianca Bosker at The Huffington Post. Some speculate Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman only temporarily before pursuing a career in the public sector, a field in which he has previously demonstrated interest. She quotes Google biographer Ken Auletta who says ''he jumped'' and ''won't stay that long'' at the company. He Was Pushed Eric Schmidt stepping down creates a ''huge advantage'' for Google, writes

Sample Eric Schmidt said the changes had come after several internal discussions in which they came to the conclusion thus far that sharing responsibility for all decisions at Google adds delay and so forth in the way we make decisions. Things will run much better, Eric Schmidt said, ''by elevating me and having Larry running things day-to-day.''
